package.name: Emarsys_Suite2
package.summary: A turnkey solution to phttp://emarsys.clients.smile.fr/ee14/index.php/admin/extension_custom/index/key/389aab0217a44369d25d7781fe5fd6400049b8f17590457e52029898a186aa4d/#lug your Emarsys Emarketing Suite directly into your Magento shop.
package.description:
ENGAGE CUSTOMERS - Emarsys triggers automated marketing communications to keep customers coming back to your Magento site. VIP TREATMENT - Identify your most valuable customers and target them with tailored incentives. MANAGE YOUR INVENTORY - Stock clearance campaigns are easy with Smart Insight’s product affinity reports. SOCIAL RETARGETING - Follow up your email campaigns with personalized social ads.
FEATURES * Real-time synchronization of Magento contacts to your eMarketing Suite * Excellent deliverability through our built-in double opt-in process * Integration of Emarsys transactional mails with your Magento site * Send all your purchase data and product catalogue to Smart Insight
package.notes:
Version 0.1.2 Updated CDN API Url
Version 0.1.1 Fixed crash when custom_entry_point changed by 3rd party plugins
Version 0.1.0 Added option to change order of contacts sync (import > export / export > import) Fieldmapping now works correctly when one of the websites have misconfigured or disabled API
Version 0.0.9 Removed checkids call, replaced POST/PUT updates to PUT with flag create_if_not_exists=1, so now only one api call will be done when creating/saving customer. Fixed Website level mapping.
Version 0.0.7 Added order export flagging for SmartInsight
Version 0.0.6 Minor table changes for email_vars to avoid duplicates. Added mass queue cleanup for order export. Fixed SmartInsight order export.
Version 0.0.5 Added a switch for key identifier to be either standard Magento ID or email. Fixed memory leaks on mass export. Fixed minor JS issue in transactional mails happening when saved empty form data. Now doing multiple insertion when queuing mass export, instead of insert per entity. Created run-time rewrite of transactional mail template to avoid conflicts with other modules that may rewrite core/email_template class Added event listener for crontab rewriting of core/email_template Added unique index on queue table to avoid entity duplication Removed name "Magento Subscriber" for subscriber records pushed from Magento
Version 0.0.4 Fixed PHP warnings caused by too customized back-end forms Added batch size for full customers export (batch size=500) Added batch size for full subscribers export (batch size=500) Added batch size for last 2 years orders export (batch size=500) Added a lot of profiling code and profiler logging when debug is enabled Added a button to clean module logs via back-end Added a button to download module logs via back-end (generates zip, requires PHP ZipArchive)
Version 0.0.3 Fixed a slow export issue caused by flaw in queue cleaning algorithm.
Version 0.0.2 Release version of Emarsys Suite v2 extension
